articles.title: Thai army boycotts online retailer Lazada after video enrages royalists - Reuters
articles.description: The Thai army said on Monday it will ban its 245,000 members from using one of Southeast Asia's biggest e-commerce websites for official purposes after royalists said a promotional video appeared to mock the royal family.
